explains: n. 守夜；监视；不眠；警戒

sentences.en: Outside the building people continue their vigil, huddling around bonfires.
sentences.cn: 在楼外，人们围聚在篝火旁继续守夜。

sentences.en: His parents kept a round-the-clock vigil at his bedside.
sentences.cn: 他父母日夜守护在他的床边。

sentences.en: She kept vigil at the bedside of her critically ill son.
sentences.cn: 她彻夜守护在病重儿子的病榻旁。
